categories.name: Fantasy
categories.description: Books that feature imaginary or made-up stories.

categories.name: Non-fiction
categories.description: Books that contain factual information or real-life accounts.

categories.name: Children's
categories.description: Books that are intended for young readers, typically under the age of 12.

categories.name: Science Fiction
categories.description: Books that feature futuristic or imaginary science and technology.

categories.name: Biography
categories.description: Books that tell the story of someone's life, typically a famous or noteworthy person.

categories.name: History
categories.description: Books that focus on past events and people.

categories.name: Business
categories.description: Books that provide advice and strategies for succeeding in the business world.

categories.name: Cooking
categories.description: Books that contain recipes and instructions for preparing various types of food.

categories.name: Travel
categories.description: Books that focus on various travel destinations and provide tips for planning trips.

categories.name: Art
categories.description: Books that focus on various forms of art, such as painting, sculpture, and photography.
